## SwipeAdaptorProps interface

Properties that can be passed to the [SwipeAdaptor](./three-story-controls.swipeadaptor.md) constructor

<b>Signature:</b>

```typescript
export interface SwipeAdaptorProps 
```

## Properties

|  Property | Type | Description |
|  --- | --- | --- |
|  [domElement?](./three-story-controls.swipeadaptorprops.domelement.md) | HTMLElement | <i>(Optional)</i> DOM element to listen to events on. Defaults to document.body |
|  [thresholdX?](./three-story-controls.swipeadaptorprops.thresholdx.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Threshold of pointer's deltaX to trigger events. Defaults to 60 |
|  [thresholdY?](./three-story-controls.swipeadaptorprops.thresholdy.md) | number | <i>(Optional)</i> Threshold of pointer's deltaY to trigger events. Defaults to 60 |
